scripts.bundle-home: NODE_ENV=production react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file pages/home/index.js --bundle-output /tmp/index.android.bundle --reset-cache
scripts.bundle-android: NODE_ENV=production react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --reset-cache
